pageTitle: The Prime Minister announces a change in the senior ranks of the Public Service | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, today announced the following change in the senior ranks of the Public Service:

Christopher MacLennan, currently Assistant Deputy Minister, Global Issues and Development, Global Affairs Canada, becomes Associate Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs, effective February 10, 2020.

Biographical notes

  • Christopher MacLennan
